pkgmetadata.longdescription: Behavioural Studies of Large Language Models // We provide an efficient way to design and conduct psycholinguistic experiments for testing the performance of large language models. It simplifies the process of setting up experiments, and data collection via large language models' API, streamlining workflow for researchers in the field of machine behavior. For methodology details, see Duan, X., Li, S., Cai, Z. G. (2023) doi:10.31234/osf.io/ywtfd.
